notes: Re-styled and optimized the help tooltips in the preferences
Only request the Development Status information when the About pane in the preferences is accessed
Force LTR layout for the preferences tab options, at least until any RTL locales are included
The preferences, in particular the sensitivity sliders, were very sluggish to use, all should be much smoother now
Compatibility with Simplify Awesome Bar: location bar would sometimes hide while the cursor was still in it (issue #108)
Brand new preferences tab with a new "About" pane (previously the "Release Notes" tab)
The active development process for the add-on is undergoing a few changes, check out the information and links at the top of this pane for more details
When the mini bar is enabled for changing locations, it shouldn't appear when switching to a tab that belongs to the same host as the previous tab (issue #101)
Mouse sensitivity "Low" value has been increased from 1sec to 2.5sec; this should accommodate for most cases (issue #103)
The location bar could sometimes not show its tooltip text when it has a long (cropped) url
Slim Chrome was not disabled when in Customize mode
Toolbars would get stuck open after clicking the translation notification icon
The toolbars shouldn't stay visible when opening a tab context menu (issue #103)
Compatibility with Diigo Toolbar: its toolbar was constantly overflowed and seemingly emtpy with Slim Chrome enabled
Clicking anywhere in the mini bar would make the full toolbars appear, only the actual location bar should trigger this
Mini bar should show Popup Blocking Settings, Add/Remove to Reading List, and Reader View icons
The location bar was inaccessible in most popup windows
Compatibility with Status-4-Evar: focusing and unfocusing the location bar could sometimes make it forget its progress bar style
Compatibility with Forecastfox (fix version): its toolbar could cause some visual issues in Slim Chrome's container (issue #95)
Lightweight themes in Slim Chrome could sometimes be misaligned with the rest of the browser (issue #106)
Compatibility with FireGestures, if the menu panel was opened through a gesture, it would flash and jump to the top corner of the window
Compatibility with Link Location Bar, its color preferences would often not be applied
Selecting a password field and switching away to another tab would leave the mini bar constantly visible in the new tab (issue #98)
No border below the tabs toolbar on OS X 10 (Yosemite) (issue #97)
Reorganized code and did some cleanup
With Sky Lights disabled, the top slimmer (placeholder for the toolbars) will be thinner than with Sky Lights enabled
Release Notes tab URI defaults to about:thefoxonlybetter instead of chrome://..., which is now fully functional in multiprocess firefox (e10s)
The Release Notes link in the preferences dialog would sometimes fail to work
Compatibility with Tree Style Tab's autohide tabs toolbar feature, toolbars would not be properly sized

Option to show the mini bar on every tab select. This may have caused the other preferences relative to the mini bar to reset, so you may have to reconfigure them; I'm sorry for the inconvenience on this one, it shouldn't happen again.
Compatibility with Australis Small Icons, wouldn't take effect with Slim Chrome enabled
Compatibility with Classic Theme Restorer's movable back/forward button, appearance issues in the mini bar
Sometimes opening or closing the sidebar would leave the top toolbars positioned incorrectly in the window
Compatibility with Tree Style Tab, made it easier to show the toolbars when moving the mouse to the window title
Show the toolbars for a few seconds when previewing themes
Sometimes the location bar wouldn't have focus on startup when it should
The mini bar will only appear when switching to a background tab that has changed location (webhost) since it was last visible; this was the intended behavior from the start (issue #80)
Prevent some visual glitches during startup
Improved compatibility with my other add-ons, if you use any of them make sure they are also updated and restart your browser afterwards!

Compatibility with Link Location Bar, when previewing links in the mini bar and the mouse moves over it, the mini bar will jump to the other side of the window so that any links under it can still be accessed (issue #77)
A few issues with the bookmarks toolbar introduced in the last version (issue #83)
Integrate better with Firefox Developer Edition's theme (issue #82)
Add-on would forget the keyboard shortcut when opening the preferences dialog
Release notes page would not render correctly with certain locales that have long strings
Enhanced compatibility with my other add-ons
Fix an issue introduced in the last version, for compatibility with my other add-ons
Minor improvement to the themes (personas) code
Support < (less than) and > (greater than) characters in the keyboard shortcut
Added version information to the top of the window DOM tree, for better compatibility with themes
